verbs.description: rodgers - cromartie retires from raiders nfl oakland raiders [V: cornerback] dominque rodgers - cromartie abruptly retired tuesday two days after not playing a single snap on defense for the second time this season the two - time pro bowl defensive back made the announcement on social media not long after notifying team officials of his decision to call it quits after seven games with the raiders calif new york giants adelaide raiders khalil mack rashaan melvin vontae davis arizona cardinals dominque rodgers - cromartie oakland oakland raiders buffalo bills indianapolis colts raiders derek carr nfl national football league oakland california james cowser amari cooper dominque rodgers cromartie alameda los angeles chargers dallas cowboys
